name: Elemental Nodes
description: Points where elemental energy concentrates create unique environments and powerful magical opportunities. The elemental diversity provides opportunities for unique magical research and elemental crafting, while the chaotic nature creates constant danger from elemental forces.
atmosphere: Pure elemental energy swirls in visible currents while crystals of fire, water, earth, and air pulse with raw power. The air crackles with ozone as miniature storms manifest and dissipate randomly. Research apparatus lies scattered and overcharged. Convergence point where elemental planes touch the material world.
